channel.title: CVE Feed for PluginUS -- HUSKY – Products Filter for WooCommerce (formerly WOOF)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PluginUS -- HUSKY – Products Filter for WooCommerce (formerly WOOF)

item.title: CVE-2024-32680|2024-05-17T08:59:16.132Z -- PluginUS -- HUSKY – Products Filter for WooCommerce (formerly WOOF)
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal'), Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in PluginUS HUSKY – Products Filter for WooCommerce (formerly WOOF) allows Using Malicious Files, Code Inclusion.This issue affects HUSKY – Products Filter for WooCommerce (formerly WOOF): from n/a through 1.3.5.2.
